name: Laser Blues - EXTREME
description:
You are visiting a funfair in the far future. Apparently in the future you have to kill each other with disks. It's the lovechild of Tron and Windjammers but for MOBILE! Have fun :)

PLEASE PLAY WITH SOUND ON THX

IMPORTANT PLAY BROWSER VERSION IN FULLSCREEN!!!

The Best Version is the PC Version!

How to play:

Press the outer floor tiles to determine one of 3 character positions and the ones next to them to determine your shooting directions. Try to hit the enemy by doing so. The one with the most hits when the timer is over wins.

Intro:

2057. humanity is divided, the middle class is as good as extinct. The few wealthy citizens of the city meet for entertainment in the Blue Lasers FunFair. But the fair in this time is not what it used to be. Instead of thrills at roller coasters and shooting galleries, there are thrills in bloody battles of ordinary people for life and death, fame and glory! You are one of these gladiators and compete in one of the most important disciplines, the Laser Discus. The dilemma - kill or be killed! Good luck!

High Quality Soundtrack
